---
title: "SPP for MAC"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
MAC <- read_csv("MAC.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
mac <- ts(MAC[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+51/365.25)
mac %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(mac))
```

```{r}
training_mac <- subset(mac, end=length(mac)-2)
test_mac <- subset(mac, start=length(mac)-1)
fc_training_mac<-forecast(training_mac)
fc_training_mac %>%
  forecast(h=5) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_mac)
```

```{r}
fc_training_mac
```

```{r}
fc_mac<-forecast(mac)
fc_mac %>%
forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_mac
```
